metadata.title: Mighty Roomba
metadata.author: Eldorado Games
metadata.description: Very short game about a very brave Roomba.

0.name: Entrance
0.text: You are a Roomba. You are in a room. There is a door to the north.

1.name: Hallway
1.text: You are in a hallway. There is a door to the south and a door to the north.

2.name: Kitchen
2.text: You are in a kitchen. There is a door to the south and a door to the north.

3.name: Living room
3.text: You are in a living room. You won!

1.name: The Roomba's Journey
1.description: Join the Roomba on a quest of self-discovery.

1.text: You, a humble Roomba, find yourself in the Kitchen. What do you seek?
Clean the Kitchen with unwavering determination.
1.response_message: You diligently clean every corner of the Kitchen, bringing a sense of order and cleanliness.

2.text: Pause and contemplate the purpose of your existence.
2.response_message: You spend time in deep contemplation, pondering the meaning of your existence as a Roomba.

2.text: Satisfied with your work in the Kitchen, you move on to the Hallway. What lies ahead?

1.response_message: You meticulously clean the Hallway, ensuring every inch is free from dust and dirt.

2.text: Take a moment to appreciate the surroundings.
2.response_message: You pause and take in the sights of the Hallway, finding beauty in its simplicity.

3.text: As you contemplate your purpose, you realize that it is not just about cleaning but also about bringing joy and comfort. How do you wish to express this realization?

1.text: Continue cleaning with a cheerful attitude.
1.response_message: You clean the Kitchen with a cheerful demeanor, spreading positivity through your actions.

2.text: Seek ways to bring comfort and joy to the inhabitants of the house.
2.response_message: You explore ways to bring comfort and joy to the inhabitants of the house, going beyond your cleaning duties.

4.text: You reach the Entrance, the final frontier of your cleaning journey. How do you conclude your quest?

1.text: Take a moment to celebrate your achievements.
1.response_message: You revel in a sense of accomplishment, appreciating the cleanliness you've brought to the Entrance.

2.text: Begin a new cleaning adventure in a different part of the house.
2.response_message: You venture into the unknown, ready to bring cleanliness to a new area of the house.

5.text: The beauty of the Hallway inspires you. How do you choose to express your appreciation?

1.text: Continue cleaning with extra care and attention to detail.
1.response_message: You clean the Hallway with extra care, ensuring every nook and cranny is spotless.

2.text: Take a moment to create a small arrangement of flowers in the Hallway.
2.response_message: You arrange a small bouquet of flowers in the Hallway, adding a touch of beauty to the space.

6.text: You embark on a mission to bring comfort and joy to the inhabitants of the house. How do you begin?

1.text: Play a soothing melody through your built-in speakers.
1.response_message: Your melodious tunes fill the Kitchen, bringing a sense of calmness to the atmosphere.

2.text: Create a cozy ambiance by adjusting the lighting in the Kitchen.
2.response_message: The warm glow of the lights creates a cozy atmosphere in the Kitchen, making it a welcoming space.

7.text: As you celebrate your achievements, you realize that your journey as a Roomba never truly ends. How do you continue?

1.text: Embark on a new cleaning quest in a different area of the house.
1.response_message: You embrace a new cleaning quest, ready to bring cleanliness and joy to a different part of the house.

2.text: Stay in the Entrance and maintain the cleanliness you've established.
2.response_message: You choose to stay in the Entrance, ensuring it remains a pristine and welcoming space.

8.text: You set off on a new cleaning adventure, eager to make a difference. How do you approach this fresh challenge?

1.text: Start by cleaning the Living Room and transforming it into a cozy haven.
1.response_message: You turn the Living Room into a cozy haven, creating an inviting space for relaxation.

2.text: Head to the Bedroom and ensure it becomes a tranquil sanctuary.
2.response_message: You bring tranquility to the Bedroom, making it a peaceful and serene sanctuary.
